short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a Unix timestamp (e.g. 1701364815) as a human-readable date and time. Interprets seconds, milliseconds, and nanoseconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu item to convert a unix timestamp (in seconds, milliseconds, or nanoseconds) to a human-readable date and time. Useful for debugging software.
